statements: UPDATE customer_information SET address='123 Main St' WHERE customer_id=101;
UPDATE customer_information SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='555-555-5555' WHERE customer_id=102;
UPDATE customer_information SET email='newemail@example.com', address='123 Main St' WHERE customer_id=101
UPDATE customer_information SET phone_number='555-1234', age=30, preferences='{"color": "blue", "language": "English"}' WHERE customer_id=202
UPDATE customers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE customer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value='new_value' WHERE preference_name='theme' AND customer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE customer_id = 'e4d39442-3675-4e2d-b1e1-c90c39e9b280';
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value = 'dark mode' WHERE preference_name = 'theme' AND customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE email = 'alice@example.com');
UPDATE customers SET first_name='Jane', last_name='Doe' WHERE customer_id=101;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value='new_value' WHERE preference_id=201;
UPDATE customers SET last_name = 'Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1234;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_value = 'new_value' WHERE preference_name = 'theme' AND customer_id = 5678;
UPDATE customers SET city = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 100;
UPDATE customers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com', city='New York' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount=1500.75, order_date='2022-09-15' WHERE order_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1-555-123-4567', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_addresses SET city = 'New City', postal_code = '54321' WHERE customer_id = 102;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE customer_orders SET total_amount = 1500.75, order_date = '2022-05-15 10:30:00' WHERE order_id = 456;
